title: My STEM Resume
description: My STEM Resume is a professional resume builder, a job search platform, and a recruiter connection hub. Tailored for STEM professionals and job seekers, it helps you create recruiter-approved resumes using advanced AI and stunning templates. Gain access to thousands of remote job opportunities and send your resume directly to our database of 500+ recruiters. Designed to simplify your job search and maximize your career potential in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics fields
